attributes.action: Fulfill the contract of paying our index linked pension that froze at point of emigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE entered into a contract, with the UK Govt,for all of our working life, which was fulfilled {in our case} at retirement age. This pension was frozen at the point of us going to a Commonwealth Country, namely New Zealand. It would have been paid in the EEC or USA, so why not here?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Fulfill the contract of paying our index linked pension that froze at point of emigration."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16596
